pleaseIdentify: Please identify the main purpose of the resource
level: Level of the content or level of knowledge/expertise of the audience for which the resource is intended
organizations: Organization(s) involved in the publication of this resource
countriesAndGroups: Country(ies), Regional or Economic group(s) related to the resource
subject: Subject/Topic/Issue
gbfTarget: Related Kunming-Montreal Global Biodiversity Framework Target(s)
keyAreas: Key areas and strategic measures for capacity-building and development
subjectAreas: Subject areas and the Biodiversity Targets covered by the resource
information: Information on the content of resource
